overview: This is the full official review of the epic 2013 British Touring Car Championship. Take seemingly run-of-the-mill family saloon cars, strip them down, soup them up and give them to some of the best and most tenacious drivers in Britain and the result is the non-stop entertainment of the BTCC. 2013 was no exception in terms of excitement and drama as stalwarts Jason Plato, Matt Neal, Colin Turkington and Andrew Jordan served it up by the ladle-full.
title: BTCC 2013 Review
